data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Tramuntana you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tramuntana, Malta
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Tramuntana, Malta to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Tramuntana, Malta that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Tramuntana. Through your servants plant 2 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of San Pawl il-Baħar
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of San Pawl il-Baħar, Tramuntana, Malta.
Lord, the the state of Tramuntana will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Tramuntana do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tramuntana, Malta has a population of 10,100.

We estimate Tramuntana has 155 people who might know Jesus, 9,566 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 379 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 65 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 155 believers in Tramuntana that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Tramuntana
location.cities_list: Mosta, San Pawl il-Baħar, Rabat, Naxxar, Mellieħa
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mosta (17,789), San Pawl il-Baħar (14,057), Rabat (11,470), Naxxar (10,378), Mellieħa (5,976)
